page.title: 10Sports centre Whitchurch.
page.content: At{Whitchurch Sports Centre}there are facilities for badminton, weights, trampolining, gymnastics, football, squash and basketball. The price of these facilities from badminton which is about Â£1.50 an hour, five-a-side football at Â£4.50 for the pitch, and gymnastics at Â£10.25 for a 10 week session. These sports can be played throughout the year. Most of the sports have to be booked and paid for in advance. For many, especially gymnastics and trampolining, there is a waiting list. During the school holidays there is a children's hour costing Â£0.40p. I find the facilities good and use them regularly. However the centre could be improved by building a swimming pool. Also more tuition for different sports is needed.
